data.title: shear-stacking: Stacked shear profiles and tests based upon them
data.name: shear-stacking
data.description: Stacked shear profiles and tests based upon them

evidence: "This repository contains python scripts to calculate stacked shear profiles and tests based upon them" (end users run the scripts).
Usage section shows direct execution: "python run_quadrant_check.py ...", "python create_profiles.py ...", "python plot_profiles.py ..." indicating an analysis application for lensing data.

The code computes scientific lensing profiles: "it will compute the tangential shear..." and "An example application is given in section 4.4 of Melchior et al. (2015)", implying direct use in producing research results. Distribution is via the GitHub repo with no mention of packages or binaries.
